mapper.select: select distinct resourceid, name, type, time, userid, tag, details from resource where state="pass";
select distinct resourceid, name, type, size, time, userid, tag, auth, details, state from resource where userid=#{userid} and state="pass";
select distinct resourceid, name, type, size, time, userid, tag, auth, details, state from resource where userid=#{userid} and state="toPass";
select distinct resourceid, name, type, size, time, userid, tag, auth, details, state from resource where userid=#{userid} and state!="toPass" and state!="pass";
